attributes.action: stop the the distruction of pubs by putting a minimum price on Supermarket/Offlicence Alcohol.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Putting a minimum price on very cheap alcohol will cut anti social crime by stopping large excessive alcohol drinking as a Pub is more likely to throw people out. It will also give Pubs which are more expensive due to overheads, a greater chance of surviving.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
